channel.title: 317 Client Help
channel.description:
Hello, i've had theese problems with my clients.
I can only use 1 client, course source only allow That client. When using other client it's saying:
Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection
Can any tell me what's wrong, or do any have the tut for making only 1 client connect server, not other clients.
Pl0x help.

item.title: 317 Client Help
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

kilop:

You need a new source is my guess, if that doesn’t work then it’s probably your pc.

seriously your just getting your post count up make a constructive comment.

@twistedAngelz why not connect with it’s orignal client, or is it the original client thats giving you the greif.

Read full topic

item.title: 317 Client Help
item.dc:creator: @kilop kilop
item.description:
@kilop wrote:

You need a new source is my guess, if that doesn’t work then it’s probably your pc.
